French.1: Grasp advanced French grammar and stylistics: the spontaneous production of grammatically correct French in writing and in conversation (corresponding to the ACTFL's parameters for "Advanced" speaking: http://actflproficiencyguidelines2012.org/speaking)
French.2: Develop a set of reading skills that allow them to analyze a wide variety of literary styles and texts across different genres and time periods. They will be able to contextualize French and Francophone literature, culture and, to a lesser extent, history.
